author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Equivalent of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45661 for 2025, in preparation of possible data-taking at 0T in collisions during MD2.

#### PR validation:

```
runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 16834.24,17034.24
```

runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: add 2025 to the allowed 0T pp collisions workflows (.24 modifier)
